message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to offer it to you at a price of $800000. I believe this is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $1200000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. $800000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get a bit closer to my budget. I'm willing to pay $700000 for the product. What do you think?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to stay within your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I'm offering the product to you at a price of $750000. What do you think?
